com.twitter.sdk.android.core.internal.scribe

Interface EventsStorage

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    QueueFileEventStorage

    public interface EventsStorage
    Stores events in a single file in the working directory and on-demand rolls that file over to the specified target in the roll-over directory. Once rolled over, a new working file is created.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Clear out given set of files in roll-over directory

        Returns:

        Parameters:

      • deleteWorkingFile

        Clear out active working file

      • canWorkingFileStore

        boolean canWorkingFileStore(int newEventSizeInBytes,
                            int maxByteSizePerFile)
        Parameters:
        newEventSizeInBytes - the size in bytes of the event we would like to write to the working file
        maxByteSizePerFile - The size in bytes which we will enforce as the maximum for the working file
        Returns:
        true if the new event size will fit in the working file, false if not
